    • checkAdjacent

      public boolean checkAdjacent​(java.lang.String[] command) throws java.lang.Exception
      Parameters:
      command -
      Returns:
      true if the word to place is adjacent to any other word or letter. Requirement in scrabble rules.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • checkWordInDeck

      public boolean checkWordInDeck​(java.lang.String word, Player player)
      check the word can be made with words from the deck. specifically this checks if the tile that is going to be placed on the board is currently in the deck.
      Parameters:
